OrgName: Desk.com, a division of salesforce.com, inc.
activities:
As part of Desk.com’s Web-based applications provided via http://www.desk.com or associated Web pages using the desk.com domain, customers are permitted to submit electronic data and information, including personal data, into servers used by Desk.com. In this context, Desk.com acts as a data processor and does not determine how its customers’ data is utilized in servers used by Desk.com. Desk.com does not choose or determine the types of data that are submitted to Desk.com’s servers, and any access to, or use of, such data by Desk.com is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of Desk.com, as data processor, to its customers. 

As part of Desk.com’s internal operations, Desk.com transfers personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective business partners to Desk.com’s U.S. data centers for processing and storage. Desk.com collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, and business partner recruitment purposes. In this context, Desk.com acts as a data controller.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, client, customer, prospect and business partner data
